name: Safree Widgets
author: Imon Themes

sections.description:
NOTE: This plugin is meant for use with the WordPress themes developed by Imon Themes theme Safreen, which take advantage of it to add richer content areas and designs. Check them out!

Safree Widgets is a utility plugin that adds support for a specific set of content elements within your WordPress installation. This plugin will add 3 custom post types to your site:team members, clients,about us . You can still use safreen widgets for any WordPress theme, although you will have to create your own page templates.

Included Content Types

  • Team Members
  • About Us
  • Clients
sections.installation:
Installing Through The WordPress Admin

  1. Download the ZIP file
  2. In your WordPress admin area, go to Plugins > Add Plugin, and select Upload Plugin
  3. Upload the ZIP file and installation will commence
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Installing Through FTP

  1. Download the ZIP file and unpack it
  2. Upload the entire Safreen widgets to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Make sure to check the Settings > Safreen widgets page before using it right away!

Translation

Not included but plugin supports WordPress language packs.

Credits

Without the WordPress codex and help from the WordPress community I was not able to develop this plugin, so: thank you!

Enjoy!

short_description: Tags: Team Members,Clients,Team Members,safreen Add support for special content types in your website, such as a portfolio, client, and team member.
